item.description:
I hear the food is delicious here, lets go check it out before we dance the night away. Check out the Scoreboards menu here: http://tpsscoreboard.com/index.php?link=menu

 

 

Please bring plenty of smaller bills and some change to pay for your bill, remember one dollar bills are your friends, lol. I have figured out a new way for us all to figure out what our bill is, it is going well so expect that to be the way you figure out your bill. If you have used this before even you know how easy it was.

This event will be scheduled on my 2 Meetup sites, (Our Circle of Friends and Connection & Friends) there may be more people going to this event then you see. IF you are on both sites please only RSVP on 1 site. If you do on both sites I will take you off of 1 of them.

IF you were a past no-show then...... YOU will not be able to join us again, if you know you WILL attend send me an email and let me know that you will be changing your ways and join us.

Take a minute now and put the Meetup phone into your phone, that way if you are are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute: 978-304-2811, please note this phone does not accept text messages.

Is it time for you to pay your dues? Please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer” You can pay your dues at any event. Thank you in advance for paying your dues!

BAD Snow may cancel this event please remember to check back to see if we are still going to this event.

As a courtesy to everyone in the group come back to the event page and change your RSVP if your plans change or call me/send a message through the site.

Looking forward to seeing you at this event!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will be inside come on in and find us.
item.name: Dinner anyone????
